documentation.text:
@title DonationApp
 @dev A simple contract to receive donations and allow only the owner to withdraw them.

@dev The constructor runs only once, when the contract is deployed.
 It sets the deploying address as the owner.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Donation must be greater than zero."

arguments.value: Donation must be greater than zero.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Donation must be greater than zero."

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Only the owner can withdraw funds."

arguments.value: Only the owner can withdraw funds.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Only the owner can withdraw funds."

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "There are no funds to withdraw."

arguments.value: There are no funds to withdraw.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "There are no funds to withdraw."

documentation.text: @dev Allows the contract owner to withdraw the entire balance.

@dev A public view function for anyone to query the contract's balance.
 It does not consume gas when called externally.
